headline: McKesson Corporation (MCK): Among the Best Value Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires
summary: We recently published a list of the 10 Best Value Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where McKesson Corporation (NYSE:MCK) stands against other best value dividend stocks. Dividends, though sometimes underappreciated, have significantly contributed to long-term investor gains. Between 1960 and the end of […]
